article: london -- the photo of a young swedish father sobbing in his hospital bed in thailand after he was reunited with his #-year-old son appeared in newspapers throughout europe on thursday , symbolizing this continent 's sense of loss and horror over the southeast asian tsunami .
abstract: europe grieves as tsunamis hit home
